Summary: Biochemical reaction from pitavastatin lactone to 8-hydroxy pitavastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from pitavastatin to 5-oxo pitavastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from pitavastatin to 8-hydroxy pitavastatin.
Biochemical reaction from pitavastatin acyl glucuronide to pitavastatin lactone.
Biochemical reaction from pitavastatin to pitavastatin acyl glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A3, UGT2B7 or UGT1A1.
Transport from pitavastatin to pitavastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCG2, ABCB1 or ABCC3.
Transport from pitavastatin to pitavastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLCO1B3 or SLCO1B1.
